participant_1.name: Avery
participant_1.personality: Creative, passionate about music and self-expression, enjoys spending time outdoors with pets.
participant_1.background: I love being creative and expressing myself through music and hair dye. School is going well, but I'm looking forward to spending more time on my hobbies. I've been secretly watching baseball games all year, even though my parents don't like it. I am proud of my two dogs and the love they bring to my life. I take her to the park.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Practical, family-oriented, enjoys hands-on projects and gaming.
participant_2.background: I'm spending the weekend working on a new 3D model for a video game. I enjoy doing DIY projects in my free time, especially drywall work. I like to eat pizza. I am a recent college graduate looking for a job in marketing. My wife stays home with our kids.

content.text: Hi there! I'm a recent college graduate looking for a job in marketing.
Hi! I'm also a recent college graduate looking for a job in marketing.
Me too! What are your hobbies?
I like to do DIY projects in my free time, especially drywall work.
That's cool! I like to do music and hair dye.
Oh, that's interesting! What kind of music do you like?
I like all kinds of music, but I'm really into rock right now.
Cool! I like rock too. What's your favorite band?
I like a lot of different bands, but my favorite is probably Pearl Jam.
Oh, nice! I like Pearl Jam too.
What do you do for fun?
I like to spend time with my wife and kids. We like to go to the park and play games.
That sounds like fun! I have two dogs, and I love taking them to the park.
Oh, that's cool! I've always wanted a dog, but I don't have the time right now.
I understand. They're a lot of work, but they're worth it.
